p: We thank Pr. Despres Philippe for providing technical assistance and Dr Andreas Kr√ºger for giving us a early access to the A. echinus COI sequence. The funders had no role in study design, data collection and interpretation, or the decision to submit the work for publication. The contents of this publication are the sole responsibility of the authors and do not necessarily reflect the views of the European Commission. A.M., L.D. and J.P. carried out the experiment. A.F., J.P. and A.M. analysed the data. J.P., G.L., A.F. and A.M. wrote the manuscript with support from P.R. A.M. and P.R. supervise the project. A.M., P.R. and A.F. conceived and planned the experiments. E.V., S. B., L.D., A.M. and J-C.G. contributed to field sampling, mosquito species identification and sample preparation.
